comment: The "12 tribes of Israel" implies that there was more than one group that could call themselves Israelites. I don't call myself an Israelite. Or gods chosen...

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / imply-01

                  :quant 12
                  :mod (c / country
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Israel")))
            :ARG1 (p / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (c2 / call-01

                              :quant (m2 / more-than
                                    :op1 1))
                        :ARG1 t

            :ARG1 ii2
            :ARG2 (p3 / person
                  :mod c))
      :snt3 (o / or
